00039 #ifndef  __Seq_Superpose__
00040 #define  __Seq_Superpose__
00041 
00042 #include "mmdb_manager.h"
00043 #include "mmdb_math_align.h"
00044 
00045 namespace mmdb  {
00046 
00047   //  =================================================================
00048 
00049   enum SEQSP_RC  {
00050     SEQSP_Ok           =   0,
00051     SEQSP_IterLimit    = 100,
00052     SEQSP_SeqThreshold = 101
00053   };
00054 
00055   DefineClass(SeqSuperpose);
00056 
00057   class SeqSuperpose  {
00058 
00059     public :
00060       mat44    TMatrix;  // superposes Ca1 over Ca2: |T*Ca1 - Ca2|->min
00061       realtype Q;        // Q-score
00062       realtype rmsd;     // rmsd
00063       realtype seqId;    // sequence identity in structure alignment
00064       realtype _seqId;   // sequence identity in sequence alignment
00065       int      Nalign;   // alignment length in structure alignment
00066       ivector  c1;       // sup-n vector: Ca1[i]->Ca2[c1[i]] if c1[i]>=0
00067       ivector  c2;       // sup-n vector: Ca2[i]->Ca1[c2[i]] if c2[i]>=0
00068 
00069       SeqSuperpose();
00070       ~SeqSuperpose();
00071 
00072       //   Given two sets of atoms, Calpha1 and Calpha2, Superpose(...)
00073       // calculates the rotational-translational matrix TMatrix such
00074       // that |TMatrix*Calpha1 - Calpha2| is minimal in least-square
00075       // terms.
00076       //   In difference of a full-scale SSM, this simplified version
00077       // uses initial superposition from sequence alignment, hence
00078       // it should be applied only to similar chains where calculation
00079       // time is crucial. seqThreshold specifies a threshold of
00080       // sequence identity (0<=seqThreshold<=1), below which
00081       // structural alignment is not performed and Superpose(..)
00082       // returns SEQSP_SeqThreshold.
00083       //
00084       //   If keepBricks is set True, then space bricks are not
00085       // removed in MMDB and may be used in the next call if
00086       // vector Calpha2 does not change. This saves computation
00087       // time.
00088       //
00089       //   The alignment results return in public fields above:
00090       //     TMatrix  - transformation matrix (1 if not aligned)
00091       //     Q        - quality Q-score (-1 if not aligned)
00092       //     rmsd     - r.m.s.d (MaxReal if not aligned)
00093       //     seqId    - sequence identity in structure alignment
00094       //                        (0 if not aligned)
00095       //     Nalign   - alignment length in structure alignment
00096       //                        (0 if not aligned)
00097       //     c1,c2    - atom corrspondences:
00098       //                Calpha1[i] <=> Calpha2[c1[i]]
00099       //                Calpha2[i] <=> Calpha1[c2[i]]
00100       //
00101       // Upon success, Superpose(...) returns SEQSP_Ok
00102       //
00103       int Superpose ( PManager MMDB,
00104                       PPAtom   Calpha1, int nCalpha1,
00105                       PPAtom   Calpha2, int nCalpha2,
00106                       realtype seqThreshold,
00107                       bool     keepBricks );
00108 
00109     protected :
00110       math::PAlignment Align;
00111       PManager    M;        // pointers to
00112       PPAtom      Ca1,Ca2;    //   the input data
00113       int         nCa1,nCa2;  // copy chain lengths
00114       ivector     cn1,cn2;    // temporary contact arrays
00115       realtype    Rmsd0;      // quality optimization parameter
00116       realtype    maxContact; // maximal Calpha-pair contact parameter
00117       PContact    contact;
00118       int         ncontacts;
00119 
00120       void SeqSuperposeInit();
00121       void FreeMemory      ();
00122       realtype  MatchQuality   ( int Nalign, realtype Rmsd,
00123                                  int nres1,  int nres2  );
00124       realtype  MatchQuality2  ( int Nalign, realtype dist2,
00125                                  int nres1,  int nres2  );
00126       void MakeContacts        ( mat44 & TM, realtype cont_est );
00127       int  makeStructAlignment ( realtype seqThreshold,
00128                                  bool     keepBricks );
00129 
00130   };
00131 
00132 }  // namespace mmdb
00133 
00134 #endif
